attributes.action: stop rejecting petitions which are not to his taste.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Looking through the very long list of rejected petitions, it is clear that a large number have been rejected for no obvious reason, other than that the subject is one that the Prime Minister would probably rather just ignore. This is yet another attack on Freedom of Speech by this government.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
